awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: When her husband is taken hostage by his striking employees, a trophy wife (Deneuve) takes the reins of the family business and proves to be a remarkably effective leader. Business and personal complications arrive in the form of her ex-lover (Depardieu), a former union leader.

title: Potiche
